PrecisAppointment of KEVIN BROSSEAU of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Deputy National Security and Intelligence Advisor to the Prime Minister and Deputy Secretary to the Cabinet (Emergency Preparedness), Privy Council, to hold office during pleasure, effective October 21, 2024.
